attributes.action: Create a peoples forum where himself and other senior ministers listen to public grievances
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A monthly peoples forum set up where Tony Blair, Gordon Brown, John Reid etc. are questioned in person by a peoples forum represented by the people of the UK, selected the same way as jury service. The government are so far out of touch with reality and the voters that I'm not sure they have a clue as to how disaffected the country actually is.
